description.value:
Cost: 3 Hero Points

Wealth costs 3 Hero Points and means you are rich. You arenâ€™t just comfortably well-off; you are truly wealthy. You can buy almost anything you want, legal or otherwise. You probably own several homes, have multiple vehicles, and employ at least a few domestic servants. If you happen to be a tech-based Hero, you can easily fund your extracurricular activities out of your own pocket.
